    Subinterfaces of IPipe in org.red5.server.api.scope
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    IBroadcastScope
    Broadcast scope is marker interface that represents object that works as basic scope and has pipe connection event dispatching capabilities.
